main.name: Zakaria Akhfas
main.bio: My name is Akhfas, I'm a Junior Web Developer && Database Administration. I want to contribute with the skills I have and want to move forward with the ideas I have. I was looking for a full time job as Backend Developer and Database Developer in the Telecommunication Industry.
main.contactmessage: Have a project for me? Think I'd be a good fit for your team? I'd love to hear from you, give me a shout by email or by using the form below if you'd like to get in contact with me.

address.street: KP. Bendungan Melayu RT 002 RW 002 Rawa Badak Selajatan Koja Jakarta Utara

resume.skillmessage: I'm a tinkerer and always interested in tinkering with new technology, but it's the technology that really got me interested

education.description: Here I took a Bachelor in Computer Science with a Database Specialization and achieved a much more thorough education in the theory, concepts and underlying science behind more complex programming. This is where I found my interest in application programming and the security behind computers and application systems, and found that I had the ability to understand complex algorithms.

work.title: Web Developer Elearning System
work.description: For most of my apprenticeship in high school, I have worked as a Web Developer. Here I have had the opportunity to dig in and get my hands dirty with all the pieces of our software. I have worked with PHP assisted by CodeIgniter Framework and JavaScript

skills.name: Git
skills.description: I use Git for all of my projects so far. I have used Git for version control in small teams and have toyed around with contributing to Open Source Projects.

skills.name: Java
skills.description: Java was my first programming language that I started using in college years ago. It is by far the language I am most familiar with in terms of data-structure and algorithm programming.

skills.name: React Js
skills.description: I am fairly new to React and really did not like it at first. It has grown on me though and I will continue to use it going forward. I have built a ReactJS based resume-website template (link below in portfolio) which I used as a starting point for this personal site.

skills.name: Meteor JS
skills.description: I enjoy MeteorJS for it's ease of configuration and its ability to get a full stack prototype up and running quickly. I used MeteorJS in a team for a Startup Programming class in UVIC in conjunction with React to build the MVP for Smirkspace (below in portfolio)

skills.name: Node JS
skills.description: Node JS is my server-side scripting language of choice. The bulk of my experience with it has been in conjunction with MeteorJS-based projects

skills.name: Bootstrap 4
skills.description: I use Bootstrap more often than not when designing the layout for my sites. It is the framework I am most familiar with and can therefore design more quickly than with others.

skills.name: MongoDB
skills.description: I have used many different database systems and am better educated and experienced with Relational Databases. However, for many applications, the ease of use of MongoDB better suits my needs and it is much more enjoyable to work with

skills.name: Heroku
skills.description: I use Heroku as my hosting platform for most of my projects because so far they are all unpaid and their free tier is convenient. I also appreciate its integration with Github for such simple deployment.

testimonials.text: I have had the opportunity to work with Tim on multiple occasions which has always been a pleasure. He is driven and motivated with a consistently positive attitude. Tim excels at communicating with others and is always willing to work hard until he solves the problem at hand.
